Html:
Just wondering if anyone else is having trouble with it modeling ANY dps for your main hand for DW?

For some reason it simply will not model any DPS for any of the items, give no dps stats whatsoever, as well as trying to make me equip 2hs in my mainhand even with a weapon in my offhand?

Is this a problem on my end, or a problem with Rawr is basicly what im trying to get at, any confimation would be valued.

Hello Lithnor,

this is a problem on our end and we'll be looking into it as soon as possible. Yet you should be able to see differences when equipping differend main-hand weapons. Its just missing the calculations for the main-hand drop-down. Equipping a 2H and an off-hand should ignore the off-hand weapon.

Regards
